text:
e="preserve">Madeline L'Engle (November 29, 1918 – September 6, 2007) was an American writer. Her book "A Wrinkle in Time" won the Newbery Medal. "A Wrinkle in Time" was made into a movie in 2003.
L'Engle was born in 1918 in New York City, New York. She died at her home in Connecticut on September 6, 2007.
